content.projectSynopsis: I spend much of my free time building softwares and stuffs - For leisure, for fun, for being useful... for different reasons. Some of the projects are listed below.

projects.synopsis: A revamp of my previous website, featuring the use of Gatsby, GraphQL, CSS animations, transitions and variables and theming.
projects.name: About Me (This website)

projects.synopsis: My first complete full-stack project that is put into production and serve real clients. It is used to facilitate communication between local politicians and students.
projects.name: SciCom

projects.synopsis: An app that tracks surplus of your accounts (different currencies, cash or in bank), what and how much you have bought and how much of them are left. This is my first attempt to systematically keep track on where my money has gone, and to ultimately predict my account balance with current trend or some hypothetical changes in habits.
projects.name: Inventory (V2)

projects.synopsis: Using self-implemented Neural Turing Machine with Keras to investigate the performance of several agents in Atari games
projects.name: Deep Learning Course Project

projects.synopsis: The website I use to present myself. Built with react and hosted on Github pages and is eventually replaced by the website you are looking at.
projects.name: Personal Website (About)

projects.synopsis: An electron application that displays the departure time and time to destination from your location.
projects.name: MVGDashboard

projects.synopsis: A web scraper that periodically visit some housing ads websites, get new offers and send a user-defined email to the landlord. I have indeed found a new place in Munich using this tool.
projects.name: wg-crawler
